statements: UPDATE blockchain_data_access_audit SET query_executed = 'SELECT * FROM users' WHERE audit_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_data_access_audit SET user_id = 100, accessed_data_type = 'transactions' WHERE audit_id = 2;
UPDATE blockchain_data_access_audit SET accessed_data_type = 'Transaction' WHERE user_id = 123 AND access_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE blockchain_data_access_audit SET query_executed = 'SELECT * FROM users' WHERE audit_id = 456;
UPDATE blockchain_data SET access_timestamp = '2022-05-12 08:30:00', query = 'UPDATE blockchain records' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE user_audit_log SET user_id = 5, access_timestamp = '2022-05-13 10:45:00', action = 'UPDATE' WHERE log_id = 3
UPDATE blockchain_data SET query = 'Updated query', access_timestamp = NOW(), user_id = 123 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_audit_log SET action = 'Update', access_timestamp = '2021-09-30 14:30:00', query = 'Audit log updated', user_id = 456 WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE user_access SET access_time = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_data SET data = 'Updated data', timestamp = '2022-01-20 08:45:00' WHERE block_id = 10;
UPDATE user_access SET access_type='admin' WHERE user_id=123 AND access_time > '2021-10-01';
UPDATE blockchain_data SET data='New data updated', timestamp = NOW() WHERE block_id=456;
UPDATE UserAccessLogs SET access_time = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 101;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE UserAccessLogs SET access_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', action = 'login' WHERE log_id = 12345;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', user_role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 100;

UPDATE user_roles SET role_name = 'Admin' WHERE role_id = 3

UPDATE user_data_audit SET action = 'UPDATE', timestamp = NOW() WHERE audit_id = 3;
